topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5572081263687267ba561000#post_5572081263687267ba561000
What's crazy about all the recent science advancements is that in say thirty or so year it totally would be 100% possible for extreme body modifications.

Want a tail?  Take a dna source, remove the genes to identify the cell as cat dna, grow the cells, pop it on and possibly take immunosuppressants.


I doubt that kind of body modification will be popular when biomechatronics would be cheaper, much less rehabilitation and learning to control it, but I wouldn't be surprised if a few people get that sort of body modification though.
